Who I Am

Born & Bred Graphic Designer

Formally trained in understanding form and function. Learned that usability and accessibility is a prime concern. Something that is not well-designed will not be used.

Self-Taught Programmer

Started with MOOCs. Poured over books, manuals, and online communities to discover web development is the best fit for me. Built a command line ruby chess game. Attended meetups to hone web development skills. All while working a demanding full-time job.

Podcast Enthusiast

Enjoy indulging in a wide variety of comedy and history podcasts. Current favorites include Hardcore History and Spontaneanation. What do you listen to?
